SELECT c.*, n.title as book_title, n.author as book_author, n.cover_image_url as book_cover_url, n.id as book_id, rus.description as scenario_description FROM conversations c JOIN conversation_likes cl ON c.id = cl.conversation_id LEFT JOIN root_user_scenarios rus ON c.scenario_id = rus.id LEFT JOIN base_scenarios bs ON rus.base_scenario_id = bs.id LEFT JOIN novels n ON bs.novel_id = n.id WHERE cl.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cl.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
